name: Burton to the Rescue!
description:
A game where you play as young Burton. Your goal is to save a cat that belongs to the King of Babaloosa.

This game is initially an idea for the RPG Maker 1 Map Game Challenge xD

Credit goes to:

  • Victor Engine for Basic Script plugins and Diagonal Movement plugin :)
  • Enterbrain Inc. and RPG Maker VX Ace for most of the game engine and other engine scripts, incl. music and themes :)
  • Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis for Tender Love song, a classic from 1985 :)
